e: ￹`Aka~ `pi~`tefing~ `to~ `doka'~ `nira~.￺Don't touch his sores.￻不要觸摸他的傷口
￹`Caay~ `pi~`tefing~ `kako~ `to~ `tayal~ `nira~.￺I didn't get involved in his work.￻我絕不會參與他的工作
￹`Nanay~ `tefing~`en~ `no~ `Kawas~ `ko~ `faloco'~ `nira~ `ta~ `ma~`salof~ `cingra~.￺May God move upon his heart and he changes.￻願上帝感動他的心，使他悔改
￹`Ma~`tefing~ `to~ `no~ `Kawas~ `kako~.￺I've experienced special power from God.￻我被上帝感動，我已經驗到了從上帝來的特殊力量
d.f: ￹￺to move upon * to empower￻觸動，感動，加諸力量
